I downloaded this and also am trying to figure out how to change to english. It seems the language files have been altered... so the game believes it is running english, but someone translated it all to russian. Does anyone know where I can get a copy of all of the original language files?

OK guys, its true, even after reading all the comments about it being in russian & all, i took the risk & downloaded it anyway (took quite some time to download)... and then guess what? They're true, its really in russian, with no option whatsoever to change it to english. Actually the folders for the english content are available, but the files in them are all deleted.

So dont waste your time & bandwidth if you don't speak/understand russian.

The game works tho, and is complete with all the movies (in russian).
